title: JWoww is seen REUNITED with Zack Carpinello on a night out with her kids after his publicly apology
text:
True to form, the drama never seems to stop on the Jersey Shore.

Jenni 'JWoww' Farley and Zack Carpinello seem like they are back on after a brief breakup stemming from last week's episode of Jersey Shore: Family Vacation.

According to Us Weekly, on Saturday Farley, 33, and Carpinello, 24, were seen enjoying a night out with her kids, just days after he was caught on TV flirting with Angelina Pivarnick during an episode of Jersey Shore: Family Vacation.

On again: Jenni 'JWoww' Farley and Zack Carpinello seem like they are back on after a brief breakup stemming from last week's episode of Jersey Shore: Family Vacation; seen here in August

According to a source close to the publication, the pair were spotted at the Field Station: Dinosaurs theme park in Leonia, New Jersey, along with Jenni's daughter Meilani, five, and son Greyson, three.

The sighting comes on the heels of both Jenni's confessional Instagram post after last week's Jersey Shore episode, and Zack's subsequent public apology to her on the same platform the following day.

Of their outing on Saturday, the source said the on-off couple weren't overly affectionate with each other, choosing to keep the focus on family.

'They weren’t lovey dovey or touchy. They were more civil than acting like a couple, but he was affectionate and sweet with the kids,' the source said, also mentioning that they made s'mores, and that Jenni's father was also along for the excursion.

Changing winds of romance: On Saturday Farley was seen with Carpinello enjoying a night out with her kids, just days after he was caught on TV flirting with another woman

'The whole family looked happy,' another source told Us. 'The kids were having a great time during the music shows and enjoying playing the games. Jenny and Zack weren’t showing any PDA, they were playing with the kids but didn’t seem overly affectionate. Jenny was spending most of her time watching the kids.'

The couple, who've been dating since April, ran into some rocky ground last week after Carpinello was seen getting rather handsy with Angelina Pivarnick on the Thursday, October 10th episode of Jersey Shore: Family Vacation.

In response upon viewing the show, JWoww posted a fiery confessional message on Instagram, which laid out exactly how she felt about the situation.

Caught blue-handed: Carpinello ran into some rocky ground last week after he was seen getting handsy with Angelina Pivarnick on Thursday's episode of Jersey Shore: Family Vacation

Speaking truth: In response upon viewing the show, JWoww posted a fiery confessional message on Instagram, which laid out exactly how she felt about the situation

'After seeing tonight’s episode I’m pretty hurt,' Farley posted on Thursday. 'I feel disrespected by someone I called a friend and by someone who stated they loved me.'

'For 5 months I was kept in the dark about this. For 5 months I was naive, probably laughed at and made into a story line that will forever haunt me,' the reality star continued. 'My heart hurts on so many levels. One thing I learned from tonight’s episode is know your value. Don’t ever lower your standards.'

In response, Carpinello did his best to repair the damage by posting an apology via the social media platform the next day.

The couple in question: In response, Carpinello did his best to repair the damage by posting an apology via the social media platform the next day

'I made mistakes that I cannot take back, which I take full responsibility for,' he wrote. 'Jenni does not deserve any damage from anybody else. This is on me. I sincerely apologize to Jenni. I apologize to Angelina as well.'

'I love Jenni, with everything I have, I make this known to be every day. I will continue to do everything to make this known to her and her kids, who also have my heart,' he concluded.

'I will make it certain that nothing like this ever happen again, in any way regardless of outcome.'

Farley and Carpinello were initially linked in March, after Jenni had broken up with her ex-husband Roger Mathews, with whom she shares her two kids.

Jersey Shore: Family Vacation airs on MTV Thursdays at 8 pm.
